column4: Hey people, I need help with my new server configuration. Can anyone help me?
Ask your real question and find out.
Most Ubuntu users use Postfix for their MTA rather than Sendmail - you'll find more documentation and more people who can help if you give that a whirl.  (It's easier too, IMO)
Also, we usually discourage webmin, so guides will be writting with command line configuration in mind.
